sentences.sContent: Both of approaching and returning movements are along the tangent of the circle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both of approaching and returning movements are along the tangent of the circle.
sentences.sCn: 绕转之后移动方向为自南向北，也是沿圆周的切线运动。

sentences.sContent: The setting of road shape instruction along highway in mountain area was discussed using tangent offset method in road survey.
sentences.sContent_eng: The setting of road shape instruction along highway in mountain area was discussed using tangent offset method in road survey.
sentences.sCn: 运用公路测量学上的切线支距法对线形诱导标在山区高速公路的设置进行了探讨。

sentences.sContent: Of a dielectric the product of dielectric constant and the tangent of its dielectric loss angle; a measure of the heating effect which occurs in dielectrics.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of a dielectric the product of dielectric constant and the tangent of its dielectric loss angle; a measure of the heating effect which occurs in dielectrics.
sentences.sCn: 对于电介质来说，它是介电常数和介质损耗角的正切的乘积，这是对出现在电介质中的热效应的量度。

synos.tran: [数]切线的，相切的；接触的；离题的

phrases.pCn: 切线模量，切线模数；正切模量；地基应力和变形切线模量

remMethod.val: tang(接触) + ent → 和圆相接触 → 切线

words.tran: [数] 切线的，[数] 正切的；离题的，扯远的

trans.tranOther: a straight line that touches the outside of a curve but does not cut across it
